mapper.sql: SELECT s.id, s.job_id, s.stage_order, s.stage_type_id, s.stage_name, s.repository_type, s.repository_url, s.repository_branch, s.credentials_username, s.credentials_password, s.build_environment, s.environment_variables, s.use_dependency, s.dependences, s.dockerfile_type, s.base_image, s.dockerfile_id, s.dockerfile_path, s.image_name, s.image_tag_type, s.image_base_tag, s.image_increase_tag, s.image_tag, s.harbor_project, s.namespace, s.service_name, s.container_name, s.command, s.create_time, s.update_time, cicd_stage_type.template_type stage_template_type FROM cicd_stage s JOIN cicd_stage_type ON s.stage_type_id = cicd_stage_type.id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cicd_stage( job_id, stage_order, stage_type_id, stage_name, repository_type, repository_url, repository_branch, credentials_username, credentials_password, build_environment, environment_variables, use_dependency, dependences, dockerfile_type, base_image, dockerfile_id, dockerfile_path, image_name, image_tag_type, image_base_tag, image_increase_tag, image_tag, harbor_project, namespace, service_name, container_name, command, create_time, update_time ) VALUES( #{jobId}, #{stageOrder}, #{stageTypeId}, #{stageName}, #{repositoryType}, #{repositoryUrl}, #{repositoryBranch}, #{credentialsUsername}, #{credentialsPassword}, #{buildEnvironment}, #{environmentVariables}, #{useDependency}, #{dependences}, #{dockerfileType}, #{baseImage}, #{dockerfileId}, #{dockerfilePath}, #{imageName}, #{imageTagType}, #{imageBaseTag}, #{imageIncreaseTag}, #{imageTag}, #{harborProject}, #{namespace}, #{serviceName}, #{containerName}, #{command}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime} )
mapper.select: JOIN cicd_job ON s.job_id = cicd_job.id WHERE cicd_stage_type.tenant_id = cicd_job.tenant_id AND s.stage_type_id = #{stageTypeId}
mapper.update: UPDATE cicd_stage SET stage_name = #{stageName}, stage_type_id = #{stageTypeId}, repository_type = #{repositoryType}, repository_url = #{repositoryUrl}, repository_branch = #{repositoryBranch}, credentials_username = #{credentialsUsername}, credentials_password = #{credentialsPassword}, build_environment = #{buildEnvironment}, environment_variables = #{environmentVariables}, use_dependency = #{useDependency}, dependences = #{dependences}, dockerfile_type = #{dockerfileType}, base_image = #{baseImage}, dockerfile_id = #{dockerfileId}, dockerfile_path = #{dockerfilePath}, image_name = #{imageName}, image_tag_type = #{imageTagType}, image_base_tag = #{imageBaseTag}, image_increase_tag = #{imageIncreaseTag}, image_tag = #{imageTag}, harbor_project = #{harborProject}, namespace = #{namespace}, service_name = #{serviceName}, container_name = #{containerName}, command = #{command}, update_time = #{updateTime} WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE cicd_stage SET stage_order = stage_order + 1 WHERE job_id = #{jobId} and stage_order >= #{stageOrder}
UPDATE cicd_stage SET stage_order = stage_order - 1 WHERE job_id = #{jobId} and stage_order > #{stageOrder}
